discord.head: My Discord Community
discord.text: Welcome to the official Orosemo Discord â€“ the community hub for our game studio! Connect with other fans, get early access to updates, and explore behind-the-scenes content from our projects. We also have community channels for sharing game dev tutorials, tips, and resources â€“ perfect for anyone looking to learn or grow in game development. But in general, artists and gamers are also welcome to join our server and connect with others.

itch.head: My Itch.io page
itch.text: Here you can find all my games, prototypes, and asset packsâ€”everything I'm currently working on or experimenting with. I use itch.io to share my projects with the community. In addition to small finished games, I also upload tools that give a look behind the scenes of my development. If you enjoy trying out new games, this is the right place for you.
